# Build Management

<OverviewTopSectionIconNoVideo
  icon={<Icon />}
  links={[]}
  intro={
    <div>
      <p>

        A Supergraph build may be composed of multiple subgraphs, each of which may be managed by different teams or
        services. and each subgraph may be composed of one or more connectors. So technically a Supergraph build is
        dependend on connector builds and may also be composed of subgraph builds
        <br/>
        <br/>
        In this section you will learn about the build management tools that helps you list and manage Supergraph builds,
        connector builds, and schema diffs. You can easily compare and manage changes between different versions of your
        GraphQL schema.
        <br/>
        <br/>

        Hasura's build management tools help you manage changes to your subgraphs and ensure that your API
        changes are consistent and reliable.

      </p>
    </div>

} />
